author: nigel ng
text:
Been a regular in this gym for years. Just want to come out here and give a honest review.

Awesome staff and coaches with great depth of knowledge in gym. Been to many gyms but the staff here is really welcoming and caring towards the members here.

Big gym with new hack squat machine üëçüèª machines well maintained with cloth and sanitizer provided.

author: Aiden AYL
text: Really clean gym with well-kept equipment and handy lockers. The staff are super friendly and always make you feel welcome. Great place to work out!

author: Benetton Cheng
text: I‚Äôve had an amazing experience at Anytime Fitness Clementi City! The gym is always clean, well-maintained, and has all the equipment I need for a full workout. The staff here are super friendly and approachable, and they really make you feel welcome every time you walk in. I love that the environment is never overcrowded, so I can train comfortably and efficiently. The location is convenient, the facilities are modern, and the overall vibe is motivating. Definitely one of the best gyms around ‚Äî highly recommended!

author: Ryan Thike
text: Long time member here. Staffs are extremely friendly and welcoming. Constant addition of new machines as well üëçüèª will recommend to new comers ‚Ä¶

author: shawn Jay
text:
Greg is hands down one of the best trainers I‚Äôve ever met. He genuinely listens and cares about progress. He has been outstanding as a coach and motivator.

Shawn is awesomely approachable, encouraging, and knowledgeable.

Trainers like Shawn Shawn are the reason members still have faith in this gym. But know this, you lost gold.

The manager, instead of motivating or helping, she creates an environment of tension and negativity.

author: Christopher Ma
text: This AF location is always clean (including the bathrooms, big plus) and the equipment is well maintained. I've had the pleasure of working with trainer Greg to achieve my PRs and I would highly recommend both his services and this AF branch. Only thing I would change is the music!

author: Vurux
text: One of the best gyms I‚Äôve ever been to! The trainers are super friendly, and the whole place has a great vibe,  feels like a family here. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a supportive and motivating environment!

author: Joey Chee
text: Been a long time member at Clementi AF ! Very thankful for friendly, caring and enthusiastic gym trainers like Greg, Yusoff and Thomas ü•π They make the gym feel so safe and comfortable to be in. Equipments are relatively well maintained and those that are out of order get fixed quickly ! The cleaners are also constantly working and keeping the place clean ‚ò∫Ô∏è

author: Ahmad Furqon
text: The staff are very friendly and polite. Especially the sales guy named anugerah, he is really good looking and approachable. Helpful in getting my membership. Thumbs up for Anytime Fitness.

author: farah syed
text:
The trainers at Clementi City are hardworking and approachable, but the manager, Norliah Abu, is the biggest disappointment in this gym. Zero professionalism, zero empathy, and full of attitude. Every interaction feels like she‚Äôs doing you a favor by even acknowledging you. She is harsh, rude, and seems to enjoy belittling members. The environment feels cold and hostile under her leadership. The gym was supposed to be a place where I could regain focus and stay positive. Instead, the manager at Clementi City made the experience unbearable. Her lack of empathy, condescending tone, and complete disregard for member well-being pushed me further down when I needed support the most. I hope Anytime Fitness takes this seriously, because no member should be treated this way.

I strongly urge Anytime Fitness HQ to review her position, because she is damaging the reputation of the brand and driving away good people.

author: Jessie Liau
text:
horrible experience with this outlet - machines are limited, powerlifters doing 10 sets on their phone rather than actually lifting, hogging racks the entire session.

worst one yet - middle aged chinese trainer is really rude and disrespectful of other club members. just because he‚Äôs a trainer, he demands occupied machines from others who are already in the midst of using it. i don‚Äôt mind sharing, but he didn‚Äôt respect my rest time. my timer was up as well and it was clearly my turn to go again after his client, instead he insisted on going again just because his ‚Äútimer‚Äù was also up - as if mine didn‚Äôt matter.

it‚Äôs my first time coming across a personal trainer (usually well respected) like this (in this case they‚Äôre not). been to many outlets from north to central, other trainers wouldn‚Äôt even ask to share machines and would feel ashamed to disrupt your workout, although i would be happy to share with respect.

author: ‰πùÁºòÁ¨ô
text: This is the most fun gym I‚Äôve been to with such friendly staffs and members! The instructor Is always energetic doing the class. Enjoy every moment

author: Xavier Cher
text: Been coming here for 3 years and the staffs are really friendly and nice. The place is also easily accessible, due to the location being near to the mrt. The manager is also helpful in getting me my referral promo.

author: Janet Chong
text: Have been AF member in this gym for afew years! Very friendly and help staff and trainers especially Greg who always encourages me! Great vibes and community. üéâüéâüéâ ‚Ä¶

author: Fana Shafeeq
text: Heard about a horrible experience where they tried to overcharge a new member even though their promo clearly states a diff price. Only when the customer spoke up, then they were like ‚Äúoh err ya okay its actuall $XX‚Äù. Super dishonest and very scammy? Also didn‚Äôt want to give physical keyfob even though all new members have already paid a fee for the token alr. Bad customer service

author: Danish Isa B Ahmad
text: My Home Gym. Place is good but get ready to be sardine from 5pm to 8pm as it is rush hour. Good facilities and machines to workout.

author: Che Cha
text:
imo the worst anytime fitness in singapore, staff has horrible attitude, filthy place with many rusty and broken machines, and the trainers actively want you out of the gym if youre not their client.

the other reviews seem a little suspect lmfao

author: Kenneth Lim
text: Great cosy gym with ample space for classes. Been joining the OCR and HIIT classes with Coach Edward which always left me a big hot sweaty mess in the end!

author: chi qian gan
text:
It‚Äôs my go-to gym for now. The staff here are friendly and the facilities are well-equipped.
Keep up the good work.

author: Mark Lim
text: This place is my go to fitness area when im in the office..needless to say the staffs here are amazingly friendly n cheerful..always a pleasant experience...equipment are always up to date..

author: Shifaul Rosman
text: Great gym! Clean facilities, plenty of equipment, and friendly staff. The variety of classes keeps workouts interesting. Perfect for all fitness levels! Highly recommend.

author: Aa BbCcDd
text: A comfortable place for me and my friends to come for our workout. A decent place and clean for the people staying nearby

author: Ëî°ÁÖåÊ∏Ö
text: Anugrah has been really helpful with my training and also smooth for the membership signups. Highly recommended for this amazing place

author: Erena Wu
text: I felt welcomed coming to this gym for the first time and the staff is really friendly and helpful in getting me started. Can‚Äôt wait for my next workout!

author: Glen Teoh
text: Signed up as home gym a while ago. It has most equipment but I have to say the cleanliness can be improved. They do clean the floors but parts of the equipment are really nasty. I'm only taking one star off because it's the parts that people don't usually touch, but it still makes you feel a little gross.

author: Âº†Ê•ö
text: I have been coming to this outlet and really satisfied with machines.and.everything. Anugrah has also.been really helpful.for.the membership side

author: Li Jun Lee
text:
Gym has all the machines to take through upper and lower strength training. Trainers are friendly and approachable with constant stream of familiar faces coming through daily.

It‚Äôs been a period of self-discovery since I‚Äôve decided to sign up a PT package with AF Clementi on November 2023 to date.

Kudos to PT Sean whom had been professional, knowledgeable and encouraging. üí™üèª

The knowledge gain is invaluable, accelerated my journey and motivates me to keep going. I‚Äôve observed good quality of movements since started training and have been rewarded with a stronger body and diminishing body pain.

author: Jafar Sinwan
text: Like a family-friendly gym. Staff are super nice. Trainers like Greg, Sean, Yusoff are very welcoming!

author: M.H.J Goh
text: I have been a member of this gym for over a year and enjoyed my experience so far, mainly because it has most of the basic equipment and it's near enough. I also made the decision to engage a PT to help me improve my fitness and strength. I have personally experienced significant improvement in my strength and physique, and want to say a big appreciation and thanks to my trainer, Sean Lim. I recommend him if you are look for a PT. Very patient and encouraging.

author: Sea ome
text: did someone spit in the trainers coffee this morning? bro had such bad attitude like he really didn‚Äôt wanna be here, incredibly rude guy. (chinese glasses guy)

author: Kashah Riduan
text: Great addition to the club, great to see new lockers at this amazing club and great assistance by my boy Anugrah üòÑ ‚Ä¶

author: Nana Huang
text: The best place to workout in the west side of Singapore. also would come here more often!

author: Muhammad Irfan Bin Abdullah
text: staff was friendly, brought me around the gym and showed me how the gym was laid out. staff was kind and explained how the gym membership cost, and how the cost was calculated. staff showed me how to navigate the app, which as a first timer was easy to use. really good gym, and the staff there was amazing. big up my guy Anugrah

author: Sheryl Wan
text: Just checking out prices. Was running 11.11 promo - No joining fee. Although space was not as spacious compared to another nearby fitness club but enough for a gym enthusiast. Do what you need to do and get out. The young m‚Äôship consultant (Indo mixed Dutch) was friendly and knowledgeable about what you need. Best part is it‚Äôs 24hrs located just next to Clementi Mall. Very convenient to MRT and bus station. Can check out the cute PT though. Haha‚Ä¶

author: Adrian Ong (OJJA)
text: Right beside MRT, very convenient. Normal sized, equipment not the newest but it works

author: Ho Hweeying
text:
I will not be giving even a star! This is the worst service I have ever received. I was charged a failed payment fee of $15.26 due to an issue with auto-debit. This occurred because I had to cancel my card immediately after it was compromised, and the cancellation coincidentally fell close to the auto-billing date, resulting in the failed payment fee. I contacted AF via text and email to request a waiver of the fee, but I was told it could not be waived as the fee was generated by EZYPAY (the system AF uses for billing). This is ridiculous!

Despite this, I made my payment through PayNow, as I have not yet received my new card. I sent them proof of the payment via WhatsApp, and they replied, 'Your membership still has an outstanding balance for this month.'

Correct me if I'm wrong, but can I interpret this to mean that since the payment was made via PayNow or any other method besides auto-debit, AF will have to manual update the system. Does this also mean they can waive the failed payment fee if they are willing to.

I would say AF is taking granted of our membership. They are not even appreciate their members. We are paying our membership fee every single month, without us signing up as member, AF is nothing!

TLDR: AF is a money-sucking gym with ZERO empathy

author: Junaidah Ishak
text: The gym personnel are friendly, and the gym has good vibes. There are always staff around (whenever I go) to attend to my needs. Sean being one of them, is very knowledgeable and always open to answering questions.

author: Jerome Teo
text: I've been a member at Clementi AF for close to 1 year now. It's a great place with good vibes and has diverse range of equipments that meet my needs. A special shoutout to Trainer Sean, who has been a great help in getting over my fear with certain workouts and in achieving my fitness goals while always being mindful of my condition/injury. I have also gained valuable insights and perspectives from his knowledge sharing on training & diet. From my experience of benefitting from Sean's personalized program, I would highly recommend him to anyone who plans to collaborate with a PT regardless of their goals.

author: Kay
text:
I am a regular in Clementi Anytime fitness since 2020 till date. Gym is equipped with large variety of exercise machine to target every muscle groups. It also includes 3 squats/bench press racks, a smith machine and a dedicated deadlift platform to cater peak crowd. The gym has 4 washrooms with shower facilities, which is very handy for people who workout in the morning and head to work/school from gym.

The most valuable aspect I had from Clementi AF was Sean Lim‚Äôs absolute professional personal training/coaching. I met Sean in late 2020, after a slip-disc injury. Sean encouraged focusing on overall strength rather than giving up. And we set goal to improve muscle strength and overall aesthetics.

Sean‚Äôs Approach:

1. Form Correction
* Prioritized proper form over quick progression
* Addressed pre-existing bad habits in exercises
* Resolved strength imbalances through altered routines

2. Progress Management
* Set realistic, achievable targets for both body weight/body fat as well as for exercise weight
* Monitored achievements
* Helped break through plateaus
* Built my confidence and self-belief

3. Adaptability
* Modified routines around injuries/sickness, or during busy periods at work
* Provided sports therapy when needed
* Created enjoyable, varied workouts

4. Nutrition Guidance
* Identified and permanently eliminated some unhealthy calorie sources, and replaced some others with cleaner ones
* Introduced concepts of macros, cutting, and bulking and helped me master them
* Guided on meal preparation, even if I have busy schedules with work

Key Achievements
1. Significant strength improvements:
* Barbell bench press: 60kg ‚Üí 85kg (6 reps)
* Barbell squats: 70kg ‚Üí 105kg (5 reps)
* Conventional deadlifts: 80kg ‚Üí 140kg (5 reps)
2. Reached sub-10% body fat

author: Yihao Poh
text:
Visited this gym for about a month plus now. The equipment there are well equipped and well maintained. Not really crowded, love the atmosphere and environment. A great place to workout üëç
Encountered an issue today with the staff in the evening, but she was very friendly and professional. Instead of chasing us out, she explained to us patiently as she knew my friend and I didn't know about the rules in the gym. She also told us that if we ever need help we can approach them, as they have professional trainers who is experienced and well educated on fitness.
Really appreciate the professionality and friendliness üëç

author: Michelle Elzira
text:
I've been to numerous Anytime Fitness outlets. Despite small sizes and all, the centres are generally functional.

Imagine my shock when I came to this centre, and realise that most of the lockers are  non-functional. The lockers come with latches for the lock .. but out of the many lockers, I counted about 5 with latches, and the rest without. What's the point of having lockers if I cannot lock my valuables?

The toilets are not the cleanest, and I think it can be much better. I believe much can be done to improve this outlet, in spite of its age.

author: shaun tan
text: Theres this PT there, Sean, very friendly, helpful. Even though im not his client, he helps me with my form, guides me in my workout, spots me and also gives me tips on dieting and etc. Best staff! Unlike some others whom only focus on ego lifting.

author: Marie
text: Been here for over 5 years, great vibes. Personal trainer Sean is the best ü§©ü§© ‚Ä¶

author: Chris Koh
text: Blatantly showing the $60 tailgate fee that got your sister outlet AF Bugis in trouble. Is it the responsibility of the member to enforce this? Why not hire a security guard?

author: ÁîòÊåØÊ¥ã
text: Great place friendly people and a lot of equipments!

author: Natalie Tay
text:
With this gym, you can really exercise anytime. The staff is great, friendly, and the people are, too.

As a gym, the facility is small but you can pretty much do anything there. It tends to get very crowded probably due to the cheaper fees. The restrooms are unlike typical larger gyms and while sufficient, can be quite underwhelming.

Five stars for price and convenience, minus two for small and crowded space, and loud music.

author: Godwin Koh
text:
Look no further if you are into a gym that is inclusive and not intimidating at all. So many friendly people coming from a wide range of background. From old to young. From experienced to the "newbie".

The gym is also quite big, with an open space that is frequently used to hold classes (If you are into this sort of perks).

Its also one of the few rare gym that offers an entire bathroom suite for us to shower instead of cubicles. It makes the whole place even more cosy.

If you are into the connection with the staff, fret not, look out for Elene! She gave a very well tailored explanation when i was signing up, very understanding to my situation as a student and was able to wait for my decision without being intrusive.

From what i can see,  the PTs are very engaging and they would often put in the extra effort to make sure their client pushes to their hardest.

All good times with minimal fuss.

author: Yew Meng Choo
text: Staff are friendly and equipments are good. Changing rooms are underwhelming (compared to the other AFs), air con is not so strong (maybe because it is too crowded), the ledge of the lockers are mostly broken and the working ones are used by the staff (top left with a working ledge permanently used by the same person).

author: Haida Jacqueline
text: I'd give zero star if i could. to anyone considering this gym, pls go to a different branch instead. worst gym experience ever! im never coming back

author: Henry Ng
text: The staffs there are the friendliest I know! Very clean environment to workout as well. Can get crowded sometimes but everyone that I spoke to are courteous in sharing their machines. All in all very good culture at Clementi AF!

Equipments are old and filthy. The gym is congested and gives off a very unhygienic vibes. This gym made their members re-use the same towel to clean the equipment before and after use, defeat the purpose of cleaning then since the towel has already been tainted with the sweat of many members before you!

author: Lee Hong Rui
text: In the west (bukit batok) this is the most happening and uplifting gym. I visited all other surrounding AF and only this gym gives a vibe of friendship and support. Half of the people here don‚Äôt wear earpieces when working out. They talk to one another which is good compared to other AF where everyone just work alone and don‚Äôt talk

author: Noor Roslan
text:
Unlike other Anytime Fitness out this, this is one of the biggest in the west.
2 squat racks and 1 Smith machine. You do not have to wait too long for your turn unlike the other places.

Not to crowded as well!

Managers and gym-ers are friendly.
Toilets are clean.

author: aravind m
text: Good experiance and good environment.. feels best

author: Bryan Tan
text: The friendliest gym I‚Äôve been to. The staff are friendly and helpful, making the experience there very pleasant. The layout of the gym is great with sufficient space between machines. üôåüèº ‚Ä¶

author: Ashton van der Decken
text:
One of the most unfriendly anytime fitness gym that I have ever been to, and I have been a member for 7-8 years.

The staff don't acknowledge guests, not even a smile, the only time I ever see anyone smile was when I re-signed up.

The staff works out daily, with his girlfriend, and oftentimes I see him opening doors for some people without keycards, which  iI believe is against company policy.

Also this gym has a whole lot of guys working out in the mornings but they gossip and talk like aunties at the wet market, while hogging bars or machines.

author: J
text: Visited countless AF gyms over the years and I must say this outlet has the worst staff across all AFs. Esp Yusof. Super disrespectful.

author: Vasanth Balakrishnan
text: Much smaller than other clubs, fewer equipments and rude staff. The terms and cancellation policies are designed to trick you. They will sign you up for 18 months with no auto renewal, but will continue to charge indefinitely after the term. If you contest it, they will pretend like they are searching for more information and push it under the rug. Unethical at best, fraudulent at worst.

author: Theodore Jian Qin Tan
text:
Easily accessible from public transport. Amazing view from the gym. Selection of Gym Music was okay. Huge array of Equipment and quite spacious.
Slightly crowded. Would still recommend 8/10

author: Joey
text: Gym that feels like home ! Gym trainers and club manager are really sweet and friendly. Wish there was a larger variety of gym equipments like stair master but it's not bad ‚ò∫Ô∏è

author: Josh Loke
text:
Horrible experience with AF clementi. I brought my gf down, and the manager Yusof claimed that she cannot use the free trial because it is only available between Monday-Fri, 9am -6pm.

I cannot find evidence anywhere that this is true.

More than just that, a reasonable request to show evidence as I cannot find it anywhere was met with him yelling at me.

author: Az
text: Spacious and have very friendly staff too. One of the biggest gym i went to. Did nt have many crowd especially in the weekend mornings.

author: Rahul Garg
text: Cancellation process is terrible. They need 30 day notice after the 12 month expiry. You can't even send a notice in 11th month. It has to be after. Hence, you are basically signing up for a minimum of 13 months. The sign ups are instant but apprently cancellation needs 30 days time. What a joke.

author: Mark Barden
text: Clementi anytime Fitness is quite nice. A little bit more space, nice leg press, everybody puts the weights back, staff are friendly, overall very nice.

author: Rajeswari Raman
text: Great gym. Daily classes is a bonus. Vry friendly staff, always with a big smile. Currently my home gym. Love it.

author: Florian Parzhuber
text: Decent Anytime Fitness. A bit cramped and working out during peak period or during classes can be quite hard as the yoga class takes up about half of the space there.

author: Khant Min
text: Really solid AF gym, the staff are very friendly and the gym is relatively chill and good place to workout

author: Fizzy18
text: Its quite cramp but the trainers were lovely and friendly! Free advices from trainers that help you correct your form! :)

author: Kannina
text: Don't know if it's just me but the space is limited and the placement of the squat stand and power rack are quite awkward. Sufficient equipment though

author: Rachel Alison
text: Convenient outlet, next to the MRT station. Fun classes and friendly staff. Good place to gym!

author: Zhi Yu Teh
text: Big and spacious with two racks and three barbells, hard to find a spot during peak hours though (6-9pm)

author: L W
text: The staff (?trainer) is really rather rude and abrupt.

author: Clarence Tan
text: Love the gym! Trainers are friendly and facilities are adequate!

author: Lily Chua
text: Great gym to workout in! Friendly staff and trainers too.

author: Gu YuTing
text: the bathroom and shower area....... Will never go there again

author: Eric Tan
text: Wasting other people time using phone hogging the equipment not focus on workout should ban using phone

author: Clarence Lee
text: Sometimes crowded but sometimes not.  But still like it cause near my house.

author: Ricky Toong
text: bad experience! Got one fatty gangster who like to show off n bullied..mostly seen him every night.

author: Apple Buenavista
text: Strategical location. Near train station.

author: Rafael Ryan ‚ÄúRy‚Äù Feliciano
text: Great workout all the time. Mornings are perfect since less people.

author: kaarthick subramanian
text: Very crowded these days. But the gym is decently big enough

author: Jolene Chua
text: Received an update that opening hours is 12nn to 8pm on weekdays and 12nn to 4pm on Saturdays...

author: Guanyu Yao
text: One of the best branch in SG. Staffs are friendly too.

author: Hyacinth F
text: Good for it's 24/7

author: aaron Tan
text: Too less information that month say this this month say that just wan you pay more and more money then don‚Äôt care you already

author: Sanny
text: Room is good enough for working out freely . spacious.

text: Awful music. Louder than my noise cancelling headphone. Disrupt workout

author: C L
text: Spacious, not too crowded at off peak hours.

author: Elene Lee
text: Cheerful staff and enjoyable work out environment!

author: Nasri S.
text: Convenient location

author: Michael Tan
text: Place is small but you have every equipment to use.

author: Gregory Tham
text: Best gymming environment ever.

author: Aaron Sham
text: Great place to work out in your zone

author: Alex
text: Of many branches this is one of the less disrespectful one

author: G unit

author: Dylan Ang
text: Great club, fantastic location

author: Sweta Das
text: Very well equipped üëçüëçüôèüôè ‚Ä¶

author: Ai Nah Lim
text: Love working out here!

author: Alvin Loo
text: Clean and well managed gym

author: dltmdwnfkdldjs
text: good clean, can be crowded

author: Daniel Conte
text: Terrible experience with the franchisee Nikki

author: Daniel Tan
text: Get off your couch and move.

author: W Yow
text: Horrible customer service

author: wobbly wooger
text: nice facilities

author: James Tio
text: Location is good

author: Muhammad Nazrul
text: Spacious much!

author: Timothy Seet
text: Convenient

author: ko ko liu
text: I stumbled upon this place by chance, but it was such a good experience that I signed up right away! I run here every day. The treadmill is very clean, and the view is beautiful! The staff are also very friendly. My trainer was super nice and attentive, and I really enjoyed my workout. My trainer was Greg, and he was super nice. He speaks Chinese, which is awesome! I'll definitely recommend this to my friends! There's also a lot of food options downstairs, which is very convenient.

author: Bear Melon
text:
Gym space: 3
Cleanses: 4
Machine variations: 4
Maintenance: 5
Access: 4 (Clementi: 3 min)
Shower: 4 (4 showers, 1 change room)

Machine Life Fitness
3 racks
Good for legs and back

Everything is well-equipped, but nothing stands out.
Relatively crowded

author: XIA JIA
text: Some staff members have very bad attitudes
